name: Windows 98 Scratch edition
description:
This is was Scratch version of windows 98 that i made on scratch and Then i compiled it with turbowarp.

However This thing i will say that this thing was still in development.

but there is will be a premium edition of it.

Note for Linux Users:

If you want to run this game on the Linux Distros

you can install program called Wine to run Windows Programs

If you want install wine go into the link: https://wiki.winehq.org/Download

you can also enjoy the game through your browser without the Wine 

Go into this link to play the game through browser: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/760789554/

note:(the Project might be updated not the same as before)
